metadata.dc:author: Aguirre, A
González, E
Pérez, A
Mesa, O L
metadata.dc:description: A discussion is carried out on the use of a general-purpose personal computer as an aid for taking prophylactic and control steps in the face of epidemics due to acute respiratory infections.
metadata.dc:title: Utilización de una computadora personal en la intervención epidemiológica sobre infecciones respiratorias agudas.
[Use of a personal computer in the epidemiologic intervention on acute respiratory infections].
